product_name: O'Neill Ultimate Hybrid Board Shorts - Men's
long_description: The O'Neill Ultimate Hybrid Board Shorts blend the quick-drying, sun-protective benefits of board shorts with an attached pouch to store small items like keys and a card while you paddle. Removable front pouch offers enough space to keep track of small essentials. Stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric. Hand pockets, side cargo pocket and back pockets. Zip fly; internal waistband drawcord.
short_description: The O'Neill Ultimate Hybrid Board Shorts blend the quick-drying, sun-protective benefits of board shorts with an attached pouch to store small items like keys and a card while you paddle.
